Question
========

A `data.frame` is a [[1]] of [[2]] that all have the same length.

Which ordered pair of words replaces [[1]] and [[2]] to best complete the sentence?

Answerlist
----------

* `list`, vectors
* `matrix`, vectors
* `tibble`, vectors
* `matrix`, lists
* `tibble`, lists

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct. 
* No, a `data.frame` is not a `matrix`.
* No, a `data.frame` is not necessarily a `tibble`.
* No, a `data.frame` is not a `matrix`.
* No, a `data.frame` is not necessarily a `tibble`.
